price: When he headed towards Midian, he said, “My Lord will surely guide me to a straight way.”
arabic: وَلَمَّا تَوَجَّهَ تِلۡقَآءَ مَدۡيَنَ قَالَ عَسَىٰ رَبِّيٓ أَن يَهۡدِيَنِي سَوَآءَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
